Text:
Can anyone tell me why uTorrent keeps saying "Files missing from job, please re-check"?

I seem to have this problem whenever a torrent has lots of files in it.

right click on the torrent name, and click re check, it will go to 0 percent and recheck what is there and dl the rest.
It could be your disk is badly fragmented or something, and i had it happen to, nothing to worry
